name: react-vertical-timeline-component

scripts.postpublish: npm run gh-pages && npm run gh-pages:deploy
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run dist:es6 && npm run dist:modules && npm run dist:css
scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run test:lint
